subject: helping deform
body:
But either way we will be blessed and be a 
blessing.
Somehow I doubt he would be legislating at Annual 
Conference or going after political opponents if he were physically present today as 
a member in the UMC. Now, does that mean we should let AC's continue like they have 
been? ) People, we're missing something big.
Or should they think it is an obligation for all 
Christians to gather and worship if it is physically possible? 00 gets you coffee at 
7-11.
